AUTHOR: Pwnulatr and Tyler
INSTALL_MSG:
Successfully installed the cog.
use `[p]help` to see the commands for datestatustimer under `Datestatustimer`
NAME: Datestatustimer
SHORT: Counts down days until a set event in bots playing status
DESCRIPTION:
Set up a date to have the bot count down to with this cog. Use `

datestatus` to get commands.
